passive.name: TRIUMPHANT ROAR
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) TRIUMPHANT ROAR
                                When Alistar takes damage, he heals himself for 27 - 160 (+9.5 ) and nearby allied champions for 54 - 320 (+19 ).Knocking up or stunning champions with Alistar's abilities reduces the cooldown by 10 seconds. (Cooldown 40s.)

q.name: (Q) PULVERIZE
q.description:
(Q) PULVERIZE
 13.5/12/10.5/9s   65/70/75/80 
                                
                                
                                Deals 60 magic damage (60/110/160/210 + 50% ) to nearby enemies and knocks them up for 1 second(s)Knock-up radius:  275.

w.name: (W) HEADBUTT
w.description:
(W) HEADBUTT
 13.5/12/10.5/9s   65/70/75/80 
                                
                                
                                Dashes toward an enemy, dealing 50 magic damage (50/120/190/260 + 60% ) and knocking them back.May target turrets to deal 75% bonus damage.

e.name: (E) TRAMPLE
e.description:
(E) TRAMPLE
 11.5/11/10.5/10s   50/60/70/80 
                                
                                
                                Deals 100 magic damage (100/150/200/250 + 40% ) to nearby enemies over 5 seconds.If Trample damages an enemy champion 5 times, Alistar's next attack within 5 seconds is empowered to deal an additional 40 magic damage () and stuns for 1 second.Only one stack can be gained per tick.

r.name: (R) UNBREAKABLE WILL
r.description:
(R) UNBREAKABLE WILL
 75/65/55s   100 
                                
                                
                                Removes crowd control effects and gain 55/65/75% damage reduction for 7 seconds.
